meanings.definition: A molecule containing two unpaired electrons.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the biradicals in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Biradicals are important in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The biradicals in the experiment were quite mischievous.
meanings.sent4: The biradicals danced around the nucleus like playful electrons.
meanings.sent5: The concept of biradicals can be tricky to understand at first.

meanings.definition: A compound with two radical groups.
meanings.sent1: She synthesized a new biradicals compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The biradicals compound showed interesting properties.
meanings.sent3: The biradicals in the mixture seemed to have a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: The biradicals compound was a dynamic duo in the reaction.
meanings.sent5: The structure of the biradicals compound was visually striking.
